content

Class Document

  • java.lang.Object
    • content.Document

  • public class Document
extends java.lang.Object
    A Document is the abstract representation of a... Document. Pretty simple, hey? It consists of Elements.
    Author:
    Bruno Quercia

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates an empty Document

      Creates a document with pre-existing elements

      • setElements

        public void setElements(java.util.LinkedList<content.Element> elements)
        Changes the elements of the Document. All pre-existing elements will be erased.
        Parameters:
        elements - the new elements
